statements: SELECT * FROM historical_figures ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, birth_date FROM historical_figures WHERE nationality = 'American';
SELECT id, name, occupation FROM historical_figures WHERE birth_date > '1800-01-01';
SELECT * FROM historical_figures WHERE occupation LIKE '%scientist%';
SELECT id, nationality FROM historical_figures WHERE occupation = 'Politician' ORDER BY nationality ASC;

SELECT name, birth_date, occupation FROM historical_figures WHERE birth_date < '1800-01-01' ORDER BY birth_date DESC;

SELECT event_name, location FROM historical_events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '1000-01-01' AND '1500-12-31';
SELECT name, nationality FROM historical_figures WHERE nationality = 'Roman' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM historical_events;
SELECT name, birth_date, nationality FROM historical_figures WHERE nationality='American' AND birth_date>'1800-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_date, location FROM historical_events WHERE event_date<'1900-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC;

SELECT hf.name AS figure_name, he.event_name, he.event_date FROM historical_figures hf JOIN historical_figures_events hfe ON hf.id=hfe.figure_id JOIN historical_events he ON hfe.event_id=he.id WHERE he.event_date>'1750-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT nationality FROM historical_figures;

SELECT hf.name, COUNT(he.event_name) AS event_count FROM historical_figures hf JOIN historical_figures_events hfe ON hf.id=hfe.figure_id JOIN historical_events he ON hfe.event_id=he.id GROUP BY hf.name HAVING event_count>1 ORDER BY event_count DESC;

SELECT name, birth_date FROM HistoricalFigures ORDER BY birth_date DESC

SELECT figure_id, related_figure_id, relationship_type FROM Relationships
